title: Apex Global Website
summary: A single-page digital marketing website built in Framer with smooth animations, modern layout design, and a clean visual flow. Designed to give APEX Global a strong digital presence and clearly communicate their services.

title: One Lab Agency Website
summary: A modern Framer-built website created for APEX Global to showcase the type of high-quality, animated, responsive websites their digital marketing agency can provide to clients.

title: Multiple Activities
summary: A multi-feature app containing five mini-applications showcasing Supabase CRUD, authentication, and data management. Includes a to-do list, photo manager (Google Drive Lite), food review app, Pok√©mon review app, and a Markdown notes application with live preview. (Supabase project expired.)

title: Secret Page
summary: A multi-page authentication app where users can register, log in, view secret messages, create/update their own messages, manage friendships, and access protected content with proper permission handling. (Supabase project expired)

title: Basic To-Do App
summary: A simple To-Do app built with React, Vite, and Tailwind. It allows users to add, edit, and delete tasks with basic CRUD functionality. The app features a clean, responsive design for easy task management.

title: OtoFocus
summary: My personal photography portfolio website showcases my car photography, featuring a collection of my best shots from various events.

title: YelpCamp
summary: A full-stack web application created from Colt Steele's Web Developer Bootcamp. The project covers both front-end and back-end development, featuring user authentication, database integration, and dynamic data handling for a fully functional web experience.
